glsa.title: Firewall Builder: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: Insecure temporary file usage in Firewall Builder could allow attackers to overwrite arbitrary files.

background.p: Firewall Builder is a GUI for easy management of multiple firewall platforms.

description.p: Two vulnerabilities in Firewall Builder allow the iptables and fwb_install scripts to use temporary files insecurely.

impact.p: A local attacker could possibly overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running Firewall Builder.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Firewall Builder users should upgrade to the latest version:
NOTE: This is a legacy GLSA. Updates for all affected architectures are available since March 09, 2010. It is likely that your system is already no longer affected by this issue.
